com.iha.emulator.control.scheduler.implemented

Class DetailedScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.iha.emulator.control.scheduler.implemented.DetailedScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scheduler, java.lang.Runnable

    public class DetailedScheduler
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Scheduler
    Implementation of interface Scheduler providing means to send and process messages between server and emulator. Uses temporary and static connection to server provided by ServerReceiver and ServerController.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky
    See Also:
    Scheduler

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()

        Method called after scheduler's thread is started. Providing logic to send and process messages between server and emulator.

        Scheduler processes messages saved in adapterController.
        If register message is to be sent, uses stable connection provided by ServerReceiver. If this message is successfully sent, initiates listening on stable connection.
        If common sensor message is to be sent, uses temporary connection provided by ServerController.

        Specified by:
        run in interface Scheduler
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • clearResponseTracker

        public void clearResponseTracker()
        Clears saved responses
        Specified by:
        clearResponseTracker in interface Scheduler

      • processTracking

        public void processTracking(OutMessage message)
        If response tracking is enabled, saves response time to adapter's log message. Also if response dumping is enabled, clears this response.
        Specified by:
        processTracking in interface Scheduler
        Parameters:
        message - message to server containing adapter's log message

      • startProcessing

        public void startProcessing()
        Sets process indicator to start and notifies thread if it is waiting
        Specified by:
        startProcessing in interface Scheduler

      • stopProcessing

        public void stopProcessing()
        Sets process indicator to stop. Because of this indicator scheduler puts it's thread to waiting state.
        Specified by:
        stopProcessing in interface Scheduler

      • terminateScheduler

        public void terminateScheduler(boolean clearResponses)
        Clears all saved responses in assigned ResponseTracker and terminates scheduler's thread.
        Specified by:
        terminateScheduler in interface Scheduler
        Parameters:
        clearResponses - true if responses should be cleared, false otherwise
